# fit on training data
s.fit(longX)
# apply to training and test data
longX = s.transform(longX)
flatTrainX = s.transform(flatTrainX)
flatTestX = s.transform(flatTestX)
# reshape
flatTrainX = flatTrainX.reshape((trainX.shape))
